descriptionHtml:
***REQUIRES USKP***

\\\"Silver weapons are especially effective against ghosts, the undead and werewolves.\\\"

- Loadscreen text

The Unofficial Skyrim Patch changes one particular loadscreen, taking into account the presence of werebears in the Dawnguard expansion. The new loadscreen says \\\"lycanthropes\\\" - a more general term is just what we\\\'re crying out for, right?

What can I say? I\\\'m capable of being psychotically anal about this kind of thing. Lycanthrope means \\\"wolfman\\\" - so it isn\\\'t a more general term at all. Besides, I\\\'m not wild about Greek roots in a Nordic-themed mystical fantasy game.

So I changed it. To wereforms. And now I can sleep at night, and so should you.

==COMPATIBILITY==
Should be compatible with everything. Just make sure to load after the USKP.

==WARNING==
If you haven\\\'t got the Unofficial Skyrim Patch:

1. Don\\\'t use this, it\\\'ll crash your game
2. What the hell is wrong with you?

==UNINSTALLATION==
Just delete lickawhatnow.esp or deactivate it in your mod manager.
author: Off the Rails
